授業目的:
This TWO-Year Seminar, running in both virtual and real environments, using both quantitative and qualitative methodologies for comparative studies, explores critical issues on urban governance.
Students will learn and can use different methodologies for research work and policy consultancy, in different settings.
THE COURSE will BE FACE-to-FACE,  Plus Learning Folder and LUNA
_ Please Check with the LUNA or E-Mail from Prof.O-K.LAI
到達目標: Students can analyze urban (contrasting the rural) developmental issues and policies; making sense of urban reality (in and out of the media) of some key metropolitan cities: Tokyo, Osaka/Kobe in Japan; London, Paris and Berlin,  Frankfurt/M in Europe; Seoul, Taipei, Hong Kong and Singapore in Asia.
関連科目:
Other Courses taught by the Teacher ( O.K. LAI ). Check the LUNA References

This Class is FACE-to-FACE. Plus LUNA and Learning Folder
授業の概要・背景:
This Class is FACE-to-FACE Teaching, plus Learning Folder and LUNA
Upgrade-Promotion Report is a MUST for moving up to 4th year.
Students are expected to do research work beyond class-teaching - and reading beyond the references
授業方法:
Multi-Media Learning, Fieldwork and Intensive Workshop. Fieldwork and interactive learning will be an integral part of this Seminar.

THE COURSE WILL BE ONLINE. Please Check with the LUNA for E-Learning  Folder

第33回:
Apart from printed and digital literature review in the 1st year, individual/group field works will be conducted in some key, accessible cities (to be confirmed) in later stage.
Students will be trained to work with various fieldwork skills in both real and virtual environments.
Reading Weeks: (to be confirmed) for students with one-two meetings; lectures, seminars and discussions on urban/regional development in Asian and European context.

This two-year Seminar, running in both virtual and real environments, using both quantitative and qualitative methodologies for comparative studies, explores critical issues on urban policy and governance in a globalizing world.

Students will learn and can use different methodologies for research work and policy consultancy.
トピック.授業計画1:
Apart from printed and digital literature review in the 1st year, individual/group field works will be conducted in some key, accessible cities (to be confirmed) in later stage.
Students will be trained to work with various fieldwork skills in both real and virtual environments.
Reading Weeks: (to be confirmed) for students with one-two meetings; lectures, seminars and discussions on urban/regional development in Asian and European context.
トピック.授業外学習2:
Prepare for multi-media and fieldwork Learning in/outside classes. 
Check LUNA & 教材フォルダ  LUNA: y 三田 OK_LAI_SPS_2023-24_References
Mini-Field studies and Fieldwork will be conducted.
Reading Week (No class-Zemi) but intensive book readings & review will be conducted.

評価.備考Note0:
Assessment of students' performance is for active participation: portfolios / project reports focusing on the management of urban problems and important policy issues on the global cities.

THE COURSE WILL BE Face-to-Face. Please also Check with the LUNA. Please Check with LUNA & Y-Drive: y 三田 OK_LAI_Course_2022 Zemi_1 + Zemi_2 2022 – 24

name: 【300】研究演習I　２５／Research Seminar 1
担当者: ライ　オン　クォック（LAI ON-KWOK）
成績評価備考:
備考　Note
Active Participation is expected and in addition to Course Work Assessment, ORAL Test & Examination might be taken to Assess Student's Learning.
Students might be asked to revise and re-submit report / thesis. Additional Oral (in class or online discussions) examination might be conducted.  Interactive Reflexive Review-Learning. 
Oral Examination / Report Presentation might be conducted to check the written works.
